title: Spotify 's premium subscribers 2015 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Paying subscribers in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
There is a difference of 106.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 2019 and minimum Quarter Q1 2015.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Paying subscribers in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter Q4 2019 has the highest Paying subscribers in millions and Q1 2015 has the lowest Paying subscribers in millions.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Paying subscribers in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
There is a difference of 106.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 2019 and minimum Quarter Q1 2015.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Paying subscribers in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
Second maximum Paying subscribers in millions is found at Quarter Q3 2019.
There is a difference of 106.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 2019 and minimum Quarter Q1 2015.
Paying subscribers in millions at Quarter Q4 2019 is 124.0 , second place is Q3 2019 at 113.0, and thirdly is Q2 2019 at 108.0.
Overall Paying subscribers in millions has reduced over the Quarters.
The Quarter Q1 2015 has 1.94 times less Paying subscribers in millions than average.
